text: On 17 October 2018, a bomb attack and school shooting happened in the dining room and second floor of Kerch Polytechnic College in Kerch, Crimea. The school is attended by students aged 15 to mid-20s. 20 people (15 students and 5 staff members) died and over 53 were injured, 12 of them critically.Глава Крыма Сергей Аксенов: в колледже в Керчи ранены 53 человека The shooter was 18-year-old student Vladislav Roslyakov, who after the attack killed himself. One of the survivors said the shooting lasted 15 minutes. The crime is under investigation as a mass murder and not terrorist attack. Russian President Vladimir Putin described the attack as a "tragic event" and offered his condolences to the victims' families while attending a conference in Sochi. Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko expressed condolences to the victims, whom he described as Ukrainian citizens. ==References== Category:2018 in Europe Category:2018 in Russia Category:2018 mass shootings Category:2010s explosions in Europe Category:2010s in Ukraine Category:2010s mass shootings in Europe Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in 2018 Category:Attacks on schools in Europe Category:Explosions in 2018 Category:Mass murder in 2018 Category:Massacres in Europe Category:Murders by firearm in Russia Category:October 2018 events Category:University and college shootings
